meta.job_title: Associate Director of Event Experience Design

duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and execute comprehensive event design strategies to create unique and impactful attendee experiences.
Recruit, train, and manage a team of Experience Designers/Coordinators, setting performance goals and providing necessary support for their success.
Analyze program logistics and details, facilitate program reviews, and ensure that proposal materials are completed on time with high quality and within budget guidelines.
Participate in strategic discussions to maximize gross profit and contribute to post-program analysis and improvement initiatives.
Represent the company at industry functions, participate in site visits, and support with program assignment and workload management.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business Management, Project Management, Hospitality Management, or related degree (Master's beneficial)
